main.title: Professional Experience
main.description: My journey through various roles in machine learning and software development

experiences.description: Designing ML pipelines for Audience & Brand Safety models, building creative classifiers, and implementing audience segmentation systems that boost campaign performance.
responsibilities: Automated ML pipeline using Airflow, MLflow, Docker - cut deployment from 2 weeks to 1 week
Built creative classifier with OpenCV + Tesseract OCR and fine-tuned RoBERTa/EfficientNet - 92% accuracy
Implemented two-tower model for audience segmentation on TensorFlow/Spark - boosted CTR by 23%
Orchestrated ELT pipelines with Airflow, MinIO, BigQuery, and Superset dashboards

experiences.description: Built no-code platform for multi-agent researcher chatbots using LangChain, SerpAPI, and SQL Agents.
responsibilities: Built no-code platform for designing multi-agent chatbots with personal LLM API keys
Orchestrated workflows with LangChain, SerpAPI for external info, SQL Agent for internal data
Developed monitoring system and Superset dashboard for agent activity tracking
Implemented MinIO data lake and PostgreSQL data mart with Airflow scheduled updates

experiences.description: Designed end-to-end ML pipelines, optimized cloud infrastructure achieving 50% cost reduction, and built ETL pipelines for streaming ad interaction data.
responsibilities: Designed ML pipeline for Lorenzo Project using MLflow, EKS, API Gateway + Lambda, Cognito
Optimized cloud infrastructure - reduced costs by 50% through serverless transitions
Built ETL pipeline for ad tracking with Autoscaling EC2, Amazon Firehose, S3
Created CI/CD pipelines and dev environments for DS team on EC2

experiences.description: Automated data workflows, built predictive maintenance models, and developed customer segmentation systems.
responsibilities: Designed Python + SQL pipelines for ETL and visualization - reduced manual reporting significantly
Developed ML model (scikit-learn, XGBoost) reducing network downtime by 3.5%
Built K-means clustering model uncovering 3 high-value customer segments
